text: The Siege of Ravenna that took place between the years 539–540, was during Justinian's Gothic War. Ravenna was the capital of the Ostrogothic kingdom. Belisarius marched on Ravenna while Vitalius was already in the area. Vitalius discovered a grain shipment for Ravenna and captured it. The city surrendered and the Goths left. ==References== Ravenna Ravenna Category:Ravenna Category:539
title: Siege of Ravenna (539–540)
